data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Which field would you prefer to study: literature or mathematics? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: If there are two fields for me to choose to study, I will choose to study literature. The reason for my choice is that literature is a discipline that uses language to express social life and psychological activities. Also, it is an important expression form of culture that I can get a deeper understanding of human history by studying it. Literature expresses the inner feelings of writers in different forms and helps me to know more about the special literary period. In conclusion, by studying literature, I am getting to know the diverse literature of different epochs. (96 字)
